thread.title: Australian Open 2017: Serena Williams, Novak Djokovic and more – day four live!
thread.title_full: Australian Open 2017: Serena Williams, Novak Djokovic and more – day four live!

author: Jacob Steinberg
title: Australian Open 2017: Serena Williams, Novak Djokovic and more – day four live!
text:
07:26 
It was a mixed day for the British players. Johanna Konta reached the third round at the expense of Naomi Osaka, beating her in two straight sets, but Heather Watson and Kyle Edmund are both out. Watson squandered five match points before losing 2-6, 7-6 (7-3), 10-8 to Jenny Brady, while Edmund had an appalling afternoon against Pablo Carreno Busta, going down 6-2, 6-4, 6-2 to the 30th seed, who awaits the winner of the intriguing match between Novak Djokovic and Denis Istomin, who has just held to lead 6-5 in the fourth set on Rod Laver Arena. Istomin roars. The crowd roars. Djokovic stares. Is he heading into a fifth set? Johanna Konta grinds down Naomi Osaka in Australian Open second round Read more Heather Watson and Kyle Edmund bounced out of Australian Open Read more
